953120.name: ADK
953120.description:
During a covert excavation supervised by Conservation and Research, a richly adorned golden chest is unearthed. But what appears to be a simple archaeological find turns out to be Pandora’s Box.

The moment it is opened, an eerie, angelic chant fills the air… and the nightmare begins. An ancient plague spreads across the Earth, turning humans into ravenous, monstrous beings. From deep within the box, a forgotten entity awakens: Baphomet, a demon once imprisoned by the Templars.

Amid the spreading chaos, humanity’s last hope is A.D.K., an elite soldier sent to Sergeant David’s outpost to recover critical data. But upon arrival, he finds the base abandoned — evil has already taken hold.

Guided via radio by his trusted assistant Anya, A.D.K. must battle through monsters, ruins, and shocking revelations. His mission? Recover the legendary Spear of Destiny, the sacred weapon that pierced the side of Christ — the only key to sealing the box and halting the rise of Hell on Earth.

Defeat the legions of darkness. Uncover the secrets of the Templars. Stop Baphomet before he opens the Mouth of Hell and unleashes his brothers.
